remarks: The trace of the value of a non-zero trace-preserving endomorphism equals the trace of the argument.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Aug-2013.)
statement:
tendotr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendotr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendotr.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendotr.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendotr.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendotr.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendotr $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. E /\ U =/= O ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( R ` ( U ` F ) ) = ( R ` F ) ) $.
$d B f $.
$d T f $.
